mainBoard.flavorText: The streets of Ravnica are full of former guild members now using their institutional skills for personal gain.
mainBoard.name: Sage's Row Savant
mainBoard.text: When Sage's Row Savant enters the battlefield, scry 2.

mainBoard.flavorText: In his hands, the wind can become a weapon or a means of escape.
mainBoard.name: Storm Sculptor

rulings.text: Storm Sculptor’s last ability doesn’t target the creature you’ll return to hand. You choose one as the ability resolves. No player may take actions between the time you choose a creature to return and the time you do so.
Storm Sculptor’s last ability isn’t optional. If Storm Sculptor is the only creature you control when the ability resolves, you’ll have to return it to its owner’s hand.

mainBoard.text:
Storm Sculptor can't be blocked.
When Storm Sculptor enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: "There is no age at which you stop learning."

foreignData.flavorText: „Es gibt kein Alter, in dem man aufhört zu lernen."
foreignData.name: Barrin, tolarianischer Erzmagier
foreignData.text:
Wenn Barrin, tolarianischer Erzmagier, ins Spiel kommt, bringe bis zu eine andere Kreatur oder einen anderen Planeswalker deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres bzw. seines Besitzers zurück.
Zu Beginn deines Endsegments und falls in diesem Zug eine bleibende Karte aus dem Spiel auf deine Hand gebracht wurde, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: "No hay una edad a la cual dejas de aprender".
foreignData.name: Barrin, archimago tolariano
foreignData.text:
Cuando Barrin, archimago tolariano entre al campo de batalla, regresa hasta una otra criatura o planeswalker objetivo a la mano de su propietario.
Al comienzo de tu paso final, si un permanente se puso en tu mano desde el campo de batalla este turno, roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Il n'y a pas d'âge pour apprendre. »
foreignData.name: Barrin, archimage tolarian
foreignData.text:
Quand Barrin, archimage tolarian arrive sur le champ de bataille, renvoyez jusqu'à une autre cible, créature ou planeswalker, dans la main de son propriétaire.
Au début de votre étape de fin, si un permanent a été mis dans votre main depuis le champ de bataille ce tour-ci, piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: "Non esiste un'età a cui si smette di imparare."
foreignData.name: Barrin, Arcimago di Tolaria
foreignData.text:
Quando Barrin, Arcimago di Tolaria entra nel campo di battaglia, fai tornare fino a un'altra creatura o planeswalker bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario.
All'inizio della tua sottofase finale, se hai ripreso in mano un permanente dal campo di battaglia in questo turno, pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 「学びを止める年齢など存在しない。」

あなたの終了ステップの開始時に、このターンにパーマネントが戦場からあなたの手札に加えられていた場合、カードを１枚引く。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: "배움이 멈추는 나이란 건 없다네."
foreignData.name: 톨라리아의 대마도사, 바린
foreignData.text:
톨라리아의 대마도사, 바린이 전장에 들어올 때, 다른 생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 최대 한 개까지 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
당신의 종료단 시작에, 이번 턴에 지속물이 전장에서 당신의 손에 놓였다면, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "O aprendizado não tem idade."

No início de sua etapa final, se uma permanente tiver sido colocada em sua mão do campo de batalha neste turno, compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: «Учиться никогда не поздно».

Когда Баррин, Толарианский Архимаг выходит на поле битвы, верните не более одного другого целевого существа или planeswalker'а в руку его владельца.
В начале вашего заключительного шага, если перманент был положен в вашу руку с поля битвы в этом ходу, возьмите карту.

mainBoard.name: Barrin, Tolarian Archmage

rulings.text: You draw only one card, no matter how many permanents were put into your hand from the battlefield during that turn.
The permanent that was returned to your hand doesn’t have to still be there.
If a token is returned to your hand, it’s put there before it ceases to exist.
Barrin’s last ability checks the entire turn, even before Barrin was on the battlefield.
If a permanent wasn’t put into your hand from the battlefield before your end step begins, Barrin’s ability doesn’t trigger at all.

mainBoard.text:
When Barrin, Tolarian Archmage enters the battlefield, return up to one other target creature or planeswalker to its owner's hand.
At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent was put into your hand from the battlefield this turn, draw a card.

•将至多两个目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

foreignData.flavorText: 海圖和器具固然有用，但最好的領航員只消一兩個咒語就能讓浪潮朝著自己想要的方向流動。
foreignData.name: 研判浪潮
foreignData.text:
選擇一項～
•抽三張牌。
•將至多兩個目標生物移回其擁有者手上。

mainBoard.name: Read the Tides
mainBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Draw three cards.
• Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The second mage learned to dissipate blasts of lightning. Threat and response: thus did the study of magic progress."
—Naban, dean of iteration
mainBoard.name: Wizard's Retort

rulings.text: Once you announce that you’re casting Wizard’s Retort, no player may take other actions until the spell’s been paid for. Notably, players can’t try to raise the spell’s cost by removing your Wizards.

mainBoard.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Wizard.
Counter target spell.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Soulless demon, you are bound to me. Now we will both dwell in oblivion."
mainBoard.name: Peel from Reality
mainBoard.text: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.

mainBoard.flavorText: "As the sky opened up, we ran for shelter. Halfway there I came to the sudden realization that, already soaked, there might be more to gain from experiencing the rain than running from it."

foreignData.flavorText: „Als der Himmel sich auftat, rannten wir in Richtung Unterschlupf. Auf halber Strecke und schon klitschnass wurde mir klar, dass wir mehr davon haben, wenn wir ihn mit offenen Armen willkommen heißen."
foreignData.name: Regen der Offenbarung
foreignData.text: Ziehe drei Karten und wirf dann eine Karte ab.

foreignData.flavorText: "En cuanto el cielo se abrió, corrimos a buscar refugio. A medio camino me di cuenta de que, como ya estaba empapada, tenía más que ganar si dejaba que la lluvia cayera sobre mí que si huía de ella".
foreignData.name: Lluvia de la revelación
foreignData.text: Roba tres cartas, luego descarta una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Lorsque la pluie a commencé à tomber, nous avons couru nous mettre à l'abri. À mi-chemin, j'ai soudain pris conscience qu'étant déjà trempée, j'avais peut-être plus à gagner à connaître la pluie qu'à la fuir. »
foreignData.name: Pluie de révélation
foreignData.text: Piochez trois cartes, puis défaussez-vous d'une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: "Quando il cielo si aprì, corremmo a cercare riparo. A metà strada, d'improvviso mi resi conto che, essendo già inzuppata d'acqua, potevo forse trarre maggior frutto accogliendo la pioggia invece di rifuggirla."
foreignData.name: Pioggia di Rivelazione
foreignData.text: Pesca tre carte, poi scarta una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 「急な土砂降りに、屋根の下へと走りました。その途中、もうずぶ濡れでしたが、突然気付いたのです。雨から逃れるよりも、雨を体験した方が、多くを得られるのではないかと。」
foreignData.name: 啓示の雨
foreignData.text: カードを３枚引き、その後カード１枚を捨てる。

foreignData.flavorText: "하늘에서 비가 쏟아지자, 우리는 비를 피할 곳으로 달려갔다. 반쯤 도착했을 때쯤, 나는 이미 푹 젖은 채로 갑자기, 비에서 도망치는 것보다 비를 경험해 보는 것에서 얻는 것이 더 많을지도 모른다는 것을 깨달았다."
foreignData.name: 계시의 비
foreignData.text: 카드 세 장을 뽑은 후, 카드 한 장을 버린다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Quando o céu se derramou, corremos em busca de abrigo. Na metade do caminho percebi que, já encharcado, poderia valer mais a pena aproveitar a chuva do que correr dela."
foreignData.name: Chuva de Revelação
foreignData.text: Compre três cards e depois descarte um card.

foreignData.flavorText: «Когда разверзлось небо, мы побежали в укрытие. Но на полпути я внезапно поняла, что мы уже промокли — так что для нас будет полезнее остаться под дождем, а не убегать от него».
foreignData.name: Дождь Откровения
foreignData.text: Возьмите три карты, затем сбросьте карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 「天空突然暴雨倾盆，我们匆忙寻地躲避。但在找到半路时，我一时兴起：既然已全身湿透，为何不索性漫步雨中？这样或许能有更多收获。」
foreignData.name: 揭示之雨
foreignData.text: 抓三张牌，然后弃一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 「天空突然暴雨傾盆，我們匆忙尋地躲避。但在找到半路時，我一時興起：既然已全身濕透，為何不索性漫步雨中？這樣或許能有更多收穫。」
foreignData.name: 揭示之雨
foreignData.text: 抽三張牌，然後棄一張牌。

mainBoard.name: Rain of Revelation
mainBoard.text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

mainBoard.flavorText: "I'll make ice chimes of your bones."

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich bastle mit deinen Knochen ein Windspiel aus Eis."
foreignData.name: Frosthauch
foreignData.text: Tappe bis zu zwei Kreaturen deiner Wahl. Sie enttappen nicht während des nächsten Enttappsegments ihrer Beherrscher.

foreignData.flavorText: "Haré campanillas de hielo con tus huesos".
foreignData.name: Aliento escarchado
foreignData.text: Gira hasta dos criaturas objetivo. Esas criaturas no se enderezan durante el próximo paso de enderezar de su controlador.

foreignData.flavorText: « Tes os gelés carillonneront dans le vent. »
foreignData.name: Souffle de givre
foreignData.text: Engagez jusqu'à deux créatures ciblées. Ces créatures ne se dégagent pas pendant la prochaine étape de dégagement de leur contrôleur.

foreignData.flavorText: "Con le tue ossa farò campanelli di ghiaccio."
foreignData.name: Soffio Gelato
foreignData.text: TAPpa fino a due creature bersaglio. Quelle creature non STAPpano durante il prossimo STAP del loro controllore.

foreignData.flavorText: 「お前の骨で氷のチャイムを作ってやるよ。」
foreignData.name: 霜のブレス
foreignData.text: クリーチャー最大２体を対象とし、それらをタップする。それらのクリーチャーは、それらのコントローラーの次のアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。

foreignData.flavorText: "네 뼈가 얼어붙는 소리를 들려주마."
foreignData.name: 서리입김
foreignData.text: 생물을 최대 두 개까지 목표로 정한다. 그 생물들을 탭한다. 그 생물들은 조종자의 다음 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Vou fazer um carrilhão de gelo com seus ossos."
foreignData.name: Hálito Congelador
foreignData.text: Vire até duas criaturas alvo. Aquelas criaturas não são desviradas durante a próxima etapa de desvirar de seus controladores.

foreignData.flavorText: «Твои обледенелые кости будут издавать мелодичный перезвон на ветру».
foreignData.name: Морозное Дыхание
foreignData.text: Поверните не более двух целевых существ. Те существа не разворачиваются во время следующего шага разворота контролирующего их игрока.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我要把你的骨头冻成冰当钟敲。」
foreignData.name: 霜息
foreignData.text: 横置至多两个目标生物。这些生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

foreignData.flavorText: 「我要把你的骨頭凍成冰當鐘敲。」
foreignData.name: 霜息
foreignData.text: 橫置至多兩個目標生物。這些生物於其操控者的下一個重置步驟中不能重置。

mainBoard.name: Frost Breath

rulings.text: Frost Breath can target tapped creatures. If a targeted creature is already tapped when the spell resolves, that creature just remains tapped and doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

mainBoard.text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

mainBoard.flavorText: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.
mainBoard.name: Thriving Isle
mainBoard.text:
Thriving Isle enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Isle enters the battlefield, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
